text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's the morning after the Pretty<n>Grand Prix preliminaries.
Just as I'm<n>trying to work through a pile of<n>paperwork...

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, terrible news! Curren Chan is<n>nowhere to be
found...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Curren Chan has... disappeared?! The<n>rumor spreads
through the academy<n>like wildfire.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Apparently, she left me a letter in her<n>room. I take the letter
from Tazuna and<n>gently open it.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: "I'm going on a journey to seekenlightenment. There's gotta be awise old Uma-sage out theresomewhere."

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
"Big Bro, sorry for deciding this all on<n>my own. It's
something I have to do,<n>for my dream..."

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
"Big Sis, sorry for deciding this all on<n>my own. It's
something I have to do,<n>for my dream..."

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The letter abruptly ends there...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I feel like the sage thing must be a<n>reference I'm not
catching, but maybe<n>there's better clues on her<n>
Umastagram.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sure enough, the top post is a selfie<n>of her smiling sadly at a
port to an<n>island, uploaded a few seconds ago.<n>The
caption reads...

text_block_list.name: @Curren
text_block_list.text:
"#AWindblownFlower<n>#SweptMindlesslyByTheTide<n>
#CrestsTheWaterfall"

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The hashtags make a haiku... I<n>wouldn't have pegged
Curren Chan<n>as the poetry type, but I guess the<n>flower
imagery is a metaphor for her<n>current state of mind.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: More importantly—I have to go afterher! Just in case, I'll bring thatwith me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I arrive at the island, but I can't see<n>any signs that people
actually live<n>here. Did Curren Chan really come<n>this far
out?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I explore deeper into the<n>mountains, I hear the sound of
a large<n>waterfall nearby. And alongside the<n>roar of rushing
water...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
This is... very... painful... but for my<n>training... I must...
endure...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Curren Chan is muttering a sutra-like<n>incantation
underneath a roaring<n>waterfall?! I hastily run to her rescue<n>
and bring her out of the mountains!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, you found me... I can always<n>count on you to find me
when I'm lost,<n>Big Bro.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, you found me... I can always<n>count on you to find me
when I'm lost,<n>Big Sis.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I know that she left that hint on her<n>Umasta specifically so I
could follow<n>her steps and find her.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Mhm... Sure thing. What do you want<n>to talk about?
choice_data_list: I want to get to know you better.
I want to get to know you better.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Up until now, she hasn't talked about<n>herself with me at all.
Hearing my<n>reply, Curren Chan gently smiles.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
So, Big Bro... you want to know more<n>than just the "cute"
me?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
So, Big Sis... you want to know more<n>than just the "cute"
me?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hey, tell me this. Are you prepared...<n>to know everything
about me?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I nearly flinch at the intensity of her<n>gaze, but... if I can't look
her eye to<n>eye now, then I don't deserve to be<n>her trainer.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe... You asked for it. Well then,<n>why don't I start from
when I was<n>born?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
You know how babies instinctively<n>laugh a lot? Well, when I
was a baby, I<n>was always laughing too.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
And when I laughed, my family would<n>laugh along with me.
They called me<n>cute, and it seemed to bring them so<n>much
happiness.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
"Your cuteness has the power to<n>make everyone happy."
That's what<n>my Big Bro—my actual brother, I<n>mean—said
to me.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Back then, I made up my mind to<n>always be as cute as I
can. That was...<n>when I was about three, I think?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
And to do that, I spent a lot of time<n>researching how to be
cute. One day,<n>one of my followers came up to me<n>and
said...

text_block_list.name: Curren Follower
text_block_list.text: E-excuse me! You're the<n>Umastagrammer, Curren, right?

text_block_list.name: Curren Follower
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to you, I was able to muster<n>up the courage to
change myself.<n>Curren, you're my hero.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
...Her words made me so happy. They<n>made me realize that
my cuteness<n>could bring joy to not only my own<n>family,
but so many others too.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
I was happy when people called me<n>cute, and everyone
was happy when I<n>was cute.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I wanted to spread this circle of<n>happiness as far as I could!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I never imagined that her concept of<n>"cuteness" had so
much deeper<n>meaning behind it.
choice_data_list:
Then why did you enroll here at Tracen
Academy?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Well... Whenever I saw Umamusume<n>racing on TV, they
always shined so<n>brilliantly.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
They were dripping sweat, their hair<n>was windswept, and a
lot of the time,<n>they weren't even smiling. Some of<n>them
even looked kinda scary...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
They couldn't have been further from<n>the cuteness I'd
known, refined, and<n>believed in. But when I watched them<n>
run...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
"Cute" was the first word that came<n>to mind. Like, they
were practically<n>sparkling!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I thought that if I enrolled at TracenAcademy and won races too, then Icould sparkle like them... No, scratchthat! I could sparkle even brighterthan them!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to spread my name around<n>to even more people!
And one day, the<n>whole world would fall in love with<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
...But at the Grand Prix preliminaries<n>race, I couldn't live up
to everyone's<n>expectations.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
You see, cuteness has to be<n>absolutely perfect. If I destroy<n>
people's dreams... That's not cute at<n>all.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Having my cleat fall off because Ididn't prep properly? That's the mostuncute thing ever!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: That's why I came here to train! Iwon't let myself make the samemistake again—I will change!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I think I finally understand. Curren is a<n>perfectionist who'll
never stop trying<n>to improve herself.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her cuteness isn't just a whim or<n>fancy. She works every
second of<n>every day to make sure it radiates<n>from every
fiber of her body.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Take her racing, for instance. Her<n>sprinting isn't something
easily<n>emulated—she must've put in<n>countless hours of
training to even get<n>to this point.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And she did it all... to be cute.
choice_data_list: You really hate losing, don't you?
You really hate losing, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Huh? Are you calling me cute? It<n>doesn't feel like it, though.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I hate losing, huh? Maybe... you're<n>right.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For the first time, I feel like I<n>understand Curren Chan as an<n>
Umamusume. And I've got to say, I<n>respect her way of life
and how she<n>dedicates herself to it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Which means... I have a job to do as<n>her trainer. It's up to
me to make her<n>dreams come true!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We'll keep on training, until she can<n>feel confident in her
cuteness on the<n>track again. And to that end, I take out<n>her
fallen cleat and hold it out to her.
choice_data_list: I've been looking for you, Princess.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...Hehe. Thanks, Big Bro.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...Hehe. Thanks, Big Sis.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Finally, Curren and I have become<n>true trainer and trainee.
And<n>somehow, I'm sure that the<n>legendary Uma-sage is
watching over<n>us right now with a smile.
